metadata.Title: CVE-2022-1678 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in the Linux Kernel from 4.18 to 4.19, an improper update of sock reference in TCP pacing can lead to memory/netns leak, which can be used by remote clients.

criterions.comment: linux package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
